name: Friends (Choco)
description:
You arrive in new town where everyone is stranger to you so you decide to get to know everyone better. But it appears, this is not a simple task to complete. You wiil have to choose: who gets your help today and who gets in trouble because of you.

This is a first game I ever made but I still hope you would like it and leave a feedback. I'm always ready for any suggestions :) 

And by the way if you have a team of inspired developers I would gladly discuss any cooperation :)

Thanks for reading, have a nice day :)
